titleStmt.title: The Popes lamentation, or, The whore of Babylons overthrow being an exact compendium of his Jesuitick retinues, promises, and supplications to delude the multitude, and scape the flames on the 17th instant &c. : as also, Queen Elizabeths congratulation to the city of London.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
